mapper.select: SELECT SNSNO, USERNO, PERMISSION ,CONTENT, LIKEY, PHOTOCOUNT, PHOTOGROUP, TO_CHAR(WRITEDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS WRITEDATE FROM SNS WHERE PERMISSION = 1

SELECT SNSNO, USERNO, PERMISSION ,CONTENT, LIKEY, PHOTOCOUNT, PHOTOGROUP, TO_CHAR(WRITEDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS WRITEDATE FROM SNS WHERE (USERNO=#{loginNo} AND PERMISSION = 0) OR (PERMISSION = 1) OR (USERNO IN (SELECT FRIEND FROM FRIEND WHERE USERNO=#{loginNo}) AND PERMISSION = 0)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SNS(SNSNO, USERNO, PERMISSION ,CONTENT, LIKEY, PHOTOCOUNT, PHOTOGROUP,WRITEDATE) VALUES (SNS_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{userNo}, #{permission}, #{content}, 0,#{photoCount}, #{photoGroup}, SYSDATE)
